name: Wall-crawler
effects: Can climb on ceilings and walls as easily as it moves on the ground.

name: Scuttle
effects: Can turn its own failed disengage check into a success by taking 1d4 damage.

name: Durable
effects: The first time each round the monster takes damage, prevent 2d6 of it.

name: Savage
effects: Gains a +2 attack bonus against staggered enemies.

name: Blood frenzy
effects: Crit range expands to 16+ while the escalation die is 4+

name: Flows where it likes
effects: The ooze is immune to opportunity attacks.

name: Unstoppable
effects:
When the monster drops to 0 hp, it does not
immediately die. Ignore any damage in excess of 0 hp, roll 2d6,
and give the monster that many temporary hit points. No
other healing can affect the monster or give it more temporary
hit points: when the temporary hp are gone, the monster dies.
